metadata.Title: CVE-2019-12482 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in GPAC 0.7.1. There is a NULL pointer dereference in the function gf_isom_get_original_format_type at isomedia/drm_sample.c in libgpac.a, as demonstrated by MP4Box.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-12482` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gpac - 1.0.1+dfsg1-3
gpac-modules-base - 1.0.1+dfsg1-3
libgpac10 - 1.0.1+dfsg1-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gpac package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.1+dfsg1-3').
